person_say: I’ve been really stressed lately, the exam is coming up, and I can’t focus on studying. Is there a quick way to relax?
animal_say: I hear you! Stress before exams can be tough. There's a wonderful mindfulness expert named Bruno who can help you find quick ways to relax. Want to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds lovely! I would love to get some calming mindfulness tips from him.
animal_say: Great choice! Bruno will share some calming mindfulness tips to help you focus and relax. Let’s go meet him!
